dialogue.text: Hey, if we’re doing a show, mind telling that cactus bitch to get off my damn speaker?
She’s gonna ruin the sound if her fat ass is blockin’ the beats.
That’s my girlfriend, and I suggest you reword that sentence before I show you what I did BEFORE I was a performer.
Oh yeah? Why don’t you MAKE ME?
Babe, cool it, there’s people here. Don’t let him get to you-
-oh, and while you’re at it, why don’t you find a new girl, cause DAMN she’s ugly.
Gonna have to get the speakers washed when I get back too, so let’s wrap things up-
Shut your fucking mouth. Don’t you DARE talk about her like that.
You wanted a challenge? I’ll give you plenty of a challenge. Pick up the mic, let’s go.
